file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 73-22-02-04 - CONFIG-2 - RESISTOR MODULE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL RESISTOR MODULE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the resistor module. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACFT MODEL(S) 73-22-02-000-801-A RESISTOR MODULE - REMOVAL EMB-135 ACFT MODEL(S) 73-22-02-400-801-A RESISTOR MODULE - INSTALLATION EMB-135 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-2 73-22-02 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 73-22-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 2. RESISTOR MODULE - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the resistor module. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-12-08-000-801-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 Cockpit - LH side 224 Cockpit - RH side D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-005-B (1) Make sure that the aircraft is deenergized. (2) Remove the LH/RH Complement Console (AMM TASK 25-12-08-000-801-A/400). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-005-B (1) Loosen the screws (2) and washers (4) that attach the resistor module. (2) Disconnect the electrical connector (3) to the resistor module (1). (3) Remove the resistor module (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 73-22-02 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 Resistor Module - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B A ZONES 223 224 DET. A 3. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 1. RESISTOR MODULE DET. B 2. SCREW 4. WASHER 145AMM730049.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 73-22-02 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 73-22-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 3. RESISTOR MODULE - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the resistor module. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-12-08-400-801-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 Cockpit - LH side 224 Cockpit - RH side D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-005-B (1) Connect the electrical connector (3) to the resistor module (1). (2) Install the resistor module (1) with the screws (2) and washers (4). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-005-B (1) Install the LH/RH Complement Console (AMM TASK 25-12-08-400-801-A/400).
